text: ‘Ara apani amadera jan'ya e duniyate kalyana likhe dina ebam akherate'o. Niscaya amara apanara kache phire esechi [1].’ Allah‌ balalena, amara sasti yake icche diye thaki ara amara daya –ta to pratyeka bastuke ghire rayeche [2] kaje'i ami'i ta likhe deba tadera jan'ya yara taka'oya abalambana kare, yakata deya o amadera ayatasamuhe imana ane
